options: Try asking that question a different way.
I don't know, let's ask Tsrezì!

embed.footer: Use !profile @user [English/Na'vi] to change your output settings.

responses: Listen, the pings get really annoying. Try pinging {} instead.
This isn't how I wanted this to happen, but I think we should see other people.
They don't pay me enough for this.

I like you, so I'm gonna say this once: **Don't ping me again.**

||jkjk||
Why are you pinging me instead of learning Na'vi? You should be learning Na'vi right now! Go! Do it!
{} told me that you like him better than me.
I don't have time to explain why I don't have time to explain.
"Ma EyTuKaN, mA eYtUkAn", don't you have something better to do with your time?

Okay, look. I'll let you in on a little secret. ||Mako wrote these responses becau||
